ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(LEN(SVMXC__Service_Contract__r.Id) > 0, IF(LEN( SVMXC__Service_Plan__r.Id ) > 0, TRUE, FALSE), IF(LEN(SVMXC__Service_Plan__r.Id) > 0, FALSE,TRUE))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Parts Pricing must be associated with either Service Plan or Service Contract, but not both.
